talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: オバロ様グレートソードは奪って使い捨てるし、メガ様の時は引き際完璧だしやばい。

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: ウィングから受け継いだ大事な剣を使われた絶望顔のドリを描きたいです！

talk.author: did:plc:mwt367e5nrw4rffnqly2jgwc
talk.utter:
This sounds like a really fun idea! A lot of good opportunities for Drift to have angst and big emotions. I'm always interested in Drift's feelings about Wing while he keeps using WIng's sword.

(I'm using Google Translate so hopefully I understood everything correctly)

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: Oh, sorry! I slacked off on the translation! 😂I'm going to draw a manga about how he was disappointed in himself for betraying Wing's expectations after his friend was hurt by his precious sword during the Overlord incident.

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: There are many episodes where he is tormented, but in the end, he is comforted by Ratchet.😚💕

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: Oh, sorry! I slacked off on the translation! 😂I'm going to draw a manga about how he was disappointed in himself for betraying Wing's expectations after his friend was hurt by his precious sword during the Overlord incident.

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: There are many episodes where he is tormented, but in the end, he is comforted by Ratchet.😚💕

talk.author: did:plc:mwt367e5nrw4rffnqly2jgwc
talk.utter: That's basically what I got from Google Translate but I love all these details. Hurt/comfort with Dratchet is one of my favorites 🥹

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: It's fun to fill in the psychological details that are hard to understand in American comics with your imagination, but I really want to know when they got together!!😆🩷💓

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: It's fun to fill in the psychological details that are hard to understand in American comics with your imagination, but I really want to know when they got together!!😆🩷💓

talk.author: did:plc:mwt367e5nrw4rffnqly2jgwc
talk.utter: I really really wish we got to see that in the comic!!! I guess that's what writing fanfic is for 😄

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: I think they definitely bonded when Ratchet picked him up. Ratchet missed Drift!💕💕 I loved the episode where he had failed a lot by not speaking up properly, so he wanted to succeed this time！🥰

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: I think they definitely bonded when Ratchet picked him up. Ratchet missed Drift!💕💕 I loved the episode where he had failed a lot by not speaking up properly, so he wanted to succeed this time！🥰

talk.author: did:plc:mwt367e5nrw4rffnqly2jgwc
talk.utter: I agree! I have a lot of ideas about what could have happened as they traveled back to the Lost Light

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: Oh! I'd love to hear your Dratchet stories!!!🤤✨✨💫

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter:
一日中親戚接待でなにもできません……
My relatives are gathering and I can't do anything.🙄

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter:
食べすぎで苦しくて目覚めた…
I ate too much and woke up in pain at 4am.🤢

talk.author: did:plc:mwt367e5nrw4rffnqly2jgwc
talk.utter: Oh nooo feel better soon 😢

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: There was a lot of food during the New Year, so I got carried away... If this was Drift, Ratchet would be rubbing my tummy...😛

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: There was a lot of food during the New Year, so I got carried away... If this was Drift, Ratchet would be rubbing my tummy...😛

talk.author: did:plc:mwt367e5nrw4rffnqly2jgwc
talk.utter: What kind of food did you have?

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: Sushi! 🍣Tempura! 🍤Hamachi hotpot! 🍲Osechi! I ate a lot. 🤣

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: Sushi! 🍣Tempura! 🍤Hamachi hotpot! 🍲Osechi! I ate a lot. 🤣

talk.author: did:plc:mwt367e5nrw4rffnqly2jgwc
talk.utter:
🤤

I had to look up osechi but!!! That all sounds so good, no wonder you ate so much 😂

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: Osechi is a traditional Japanese dish! We only eat it on New Year's Day, but it's not very tasty. Haha. 😛What do you eat on New Year's Day there?

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter: Osechi is a traditional Japanese dish! We only eat it on New Year's Day, but it's not very tasty. Haha. 😛What do you eat on New Year's Day there?

talk.author: did:plc:mwt367e5nrw4rffnqly2jgwc
talk.utter:
Why isn't it tasty? 😯 The info I looked up listed lots of foods that looked good.

My partner and I like to make a charcuterie board, except we don't have a fancy board so we just put the food on a plate lol. Lots of people have parties on New Year's Eve so party foods are popular

talk.author: did:plc:uhngzq4wwuq5a3hftozaphej
talk.utter:
The charcuterie board looks delicious too!! Even if you want to buy a nice plate, it's secondary. All you need is delicious food!🥴

Osechi dishes tend to last a long time, are cold, and have a strong flavor, so they are a traditional preserved food and are not that great.🙄
